annotation.message: An operand identifier reference is hiding another identifier of the same name.

a:s.a:s: /* * Library: IMMZD18SCholeraWCRBSVaccine2DosesLogic (IMMZ.D18.S.Cholera.WC-rBS vaccine 2-dose schedule) * Schedule Table: Whole cell-recombinant B subunit (WC-rBS) vaccine (Dukoral), 2-dose schedule for clients aged ≥ 6 years */ library IMMZD18SCholeraWCRBSVaccine2DosesLogic

a:t.name: pseudo
a:t.value: "Vaccine type" = "Cholera vaccines") = 0 AND (Today's date − "Date of birth" ≥ 6 years)

a:s.a:s: "No cholera primary series dose was administered"
"Dose number of the latest primary series dose is more than or equal to two"
"The latest cholera dose was administered more than 6 weeks ago"
"The latest cholera dose was administered approximately more than 2 years ago {Member States defined interval}"

when.name: No cholera primary series dose was administered

The latest cholera dose was administered more than 6 weeks ago

when.name: The latest cholera dose was administered approximately more than 2 years ago {Member States defined interval}

a:t.name: create
a:t.value:
For WC-rBS vaccine (Dukoral), 2 doses should be given to children aged ≥ 6 years and adults, with an interval of 1–6 weeks between doses. If the interval since the last dose ≥ 6 weeks, restart the primary series.
Revaccination for those aged ≥ 6 years: If more than 2 years have passed since completion of primary vaccination series, the primary series of 2 doses should be repeated.

a:s.a:s: 'For WC-rBS vaccine (Dukoral), 2 doses should be given to children aged ≥ 6 years and adults, with an interval of 1–6 weeks between doses. If the interval since the last dose ≥ 6 weeks, restart the primary series. Revaccination for those aged ≥ 6 years: If more than 2 years have passed since completion of primary vaccination series, the primary series of 2 doses should be repeated.'

operand.value: For WC-rBS vaccine (Dukoral), 2 doses should be given to children aged ≥ 6 years and adults, with an interval of 1–6 weeks between doses. If the interval since the last dose ≥ 6 weeks, restart the primary series. Revaccination for those aged ≥ 6 years: If more than 2 years have passed since completion of primary vaccination series, the primary series of 2 doses should be repeated.

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: To be determined by Member States; however, there is no recommended overdue date.

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: To be determined by Member States; however, there is no recommended expiration date and individuals are always eligible to be vaccinated.

a:s.a:s: "Dose number of the latest primary series dose is one"

expression.name: Dose number of the latest primary series dose is one

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Date and time of vaccination" (where "Vaccine type" = "Cholera vaccines") + 6 weeks

a:t.value: "Dose number" (where "Vaccine type" = "Cholera vaccines") = 1 AND (Today's date − "Date of birth" ≥ 6 years)

a:t.value: For WC-rBS vaccine (Dukoral) 2 doses should be given to children aged ≥6 years and adults, with an interval of 1-6 weeks between doses.

a:t.name: pseudo
a:t.value: "Completed the primary vaccination series" (where "Vaccine type" = "Cholera vaccines") = TRUE AND Today's date − latest "Date and time of vaccination" (where "Vaccine type" = "Cholera vaccines") ≤ 2 years ± Member States defined interval AND (Today's date − "Date of birth" ≥ 6 years)

a:t.value: For WC-rBS vaccine, for those aged ≥ 6 years of age, if less than 2 years have passed since completion of primary vaccination series, 1 dose for revaccination.
